directions: Par boil or steam the broccoli in a large pot for about 5 minutes. You want it still cooked but still crunchy so it doesn’t overcook when you saute it with the other ingredients.
In a medium saucepan, saute the olive oil, crushed garlic and red pepper flakes for 1-2 minutes or until fragrant.
Add in the broccoli, coating every piece with the olive oil mixture.
Add in the lemon juice and parmesan cheese and stir well.
ingredients: Per serving: 108 calories, 6g fat, 8g carbs, 3g fiber, 7g protein (5g Net Carbs)
1 tsp crushed red pepper flakes (or less if you don’t want it very spicy)
title: Spicy Parmesan Broccoli
